thread.title: Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding
thread.title_full: Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding

author: Peppier handicapped symbol gets support, but problems remain
title: Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding
text:
Lightning D Nikita Nesterov suspended 2 games for boarding Associated Press 16 hrs ago NEW YORK (AP) Tampa Bay Lightning defenseman Nikita Nesterov has been suspended for two games without pay for boarding Dallas Stars forward Curtis McKenzie.
AdChoices Nesterov was given a 5-minute penalty and a game misconduct for checking McKenzie from behind in Thursday's contest in Tampa. It came at 15:56 of the second period. The Stars beat Tampa 5-3.
McKenzie needed assistance from the ice and appeared to be unable to put weight on his leg as he headed toward the locker room from the bench. The Stars said McKenzie had a game-ending lower body injury and was taken to an area hospital.
The 22-year-old Nesterov will forfeit $7,983 in salary to go to the Players' Emergency Assistance Fund.
